alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:20PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lawrence and west central Pennington Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 520 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles east of Black Fox Campground, or 13 miles south of Lead, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rochford, Mystic, Roubaix Lake and Black Fox Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills
